name: Road Creator (Inclusivity Game Jam)
description:
A little game in which you need to rotate pieces to create a road. You need to connect all pieces to create a seamless road. It's quite simple but anyway you need to FIX the road and FIND the way how to move pieces correctly.

Click on road pieces with Left or Right Mouse Buttons to rotate them.

Look out - some pieces are rotated by others!

Hope you will enjoy this little prototype. Feel free to write any feedback (I will be happy to answer to you) :)

https://share.backtrace.io/api/share/t5qx25gohsyGGsrtx1Rx1Q6X0
